sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; export default class Timeline extends Component { render() { return (
highlights

Timeline

CTO & co-founder at Crycl{" "} june 2020-present

makes all executive decisions with regards to the technological interests of a company. responsible for outlining the company's technological vision, implementing technology strategies, and ensuring that the technological resources are aligned with the company's business needs, Experience building stuff from scratch More importantly, strategize and take the lead, assign tasks make decisions and argue for them,work with the team Write code technologies react , react native ,node js,flutter,php,wordpress,google cloud

View Project

Senior mobile developer React Native at UXBERT january 2020 - June 2020

Work closely with the UI/UX team. Rapidly build prototypes/simulations from mockups that can be directly implemented. Create clean interfaces and smooth interactions based on UI/UX designs and documentation for a range of devices, including mobiles, tablets and desktops. Create decoupled, interactive web/mobile UIs using JavaScript Frameworks (e.g Angular, Ember, jQuery mobile, react). Building mobile applications backed by RESTful JSON APIs Build and maintain features of mobile apps using React (JS and Native). Accountable for delivering in an agile environment

view project

Senior React / React Native developer at HOOD 2018-2020

I have completed my higher secondary education with major subjects as Physics,Chemistry & Maths with 91 merit. During my time at school, I have developed interest in solving complex problems of the fundamental physics which helped me to improve my understanding of any problem and also my mathematical skills to actually solve the problems.

MERN Stack developer at 3ayez june 2018 - November 2020

developing JavaScript applications using Node.js, Express, React.js, React Native and Mongo DB.

mentor at coursera( Server-side Development with NodeJS, Express and MongoDB) at Coursera May 2018 - present

Volunteer to provide academic support in course i’ve already completed on Coursera. To be eligible to be a Mentor, a learner must have passed the course with a good grade and an exemplary forum participation record. I also completed a 2-week training course that covers best practices for explaining concepts, giving feedback, encouraging discussion, and using forum moderation tools to maintain a safe, fun, and productive atmosphere in the course forums.

Full stack web developer Home automation IOT project 2017 - 2018

built a home automation system using MQTT protocol , lua programming language

full stack developer at Icode 2014 - 2016

- Built a web-based restaurant management system including inventory management and cost optimization. Sold to more than 13 restaurants.

); } }
